brief_description: Taxonomic identification and abundance of coral-associated invertebrates from 60 Pocillopora colonies in Maatea Size experiment. Includes WoRMS taxonomy, body size, and sampling metadata from 2019 and 2021.
Taxonomic identification and abundance of CAFI from 114 Pocillopora colonies across multiple Mo'orea sites. Baseline survey characterizing natural CAFI variation.
Taxonomic identification and abundance of CAFI from 54 Pocillopora colonies in MRB Amount density experiment. Final sampling after 17-month experimental period.
Coral tissue physiology (protein, carbohydrates, zooxanthellae density) normalized to surface area. Data from 60 colonies in 2019 and 2021.
Coral tissue physiology measurements from 108 Pocillopora colonies. Single time point survey in summer 2019.
Coral tissue physiology from MRB Amount experiment including protein, carbohydrates, zooxanthellae, and ash-free dry weight.
Fish community observations around 60 experimental coral colonies. Includes species, abundance, body size, and behavior (resident vs transient).
Fish community observations around 54 experimental coral colonies in MRB Amount experiment. Final survey May 2021.
Supplementary comparison of coral branch tips vs stumps for methodological validation. 21 samples.
Zooxanthellae cell counts from tip vs stump comparison study. 108 count replicates for methodological validation.
3D photogrammetry measurements (surface area, height, volume) from Structure-from-Motion reconstruction. Combined Dec 2019 and May 2021 data.
CLEANED photogrammetry measurements for analysis. 3D SfM measurements from Dec 2019 and May 2021. USE THIS FILE for analysis.
Calculated coral growth metrics showing change in surface area and height between Dec 2019 and May 2021. Derived from photogrammetry.
Field measurements of coral colony size, morphotype, depth, GPS coordinates, and neighborhood analysis of surrounding coral density.
Colony size measurements across 3 time points (June 2019, Dec 2019, May 2021) for 60 experimental corals.
RAW technical output from Agisoft Metashape. Contains multiple model types. Use *_measures_* file for analysis instead.
Quality-controlled subset of growth data excluding colonies with model issues or mortality. 44 of 54 colonies.
Detailed photogrammetry measurements from summer 2019 with additional technical parameters.
Manual field measurements of coral colony dimensions. Supplementary validation to photogrammetry data.
Treatment assignments for Maatea Size experiment: coral_id linked to size class (thin/medium/thick) and CAFI treatment (present/removed).
Treatment assignments for MRB Amount experiment: coral_id linked to density treatment (low/medium/high = 1/3/6 corals per patch).
Metadata for genetic tissue samples from 60 experimental coral colonies. Includes collection date, sample ID, storage info. DNA not yet sequenced.
Grid position and treatment assignments for MRB Amount experiment. Maps coral_id to spatial position within array.
